input.sentences: the graveyard is eerie in the winter .
it 's much warmer enjoying the snow from the kitchen table .
an evening walk before calling it a night .
the next morning is especially cold .
output.sentences: Every year, the snow fall begins around the same time.
The winter always gives the graveyard an eerie glow.
In order to keep yourself a bit warmer, you can sit at the table away from the snow.
But it's also nice to walk at night with a loved one for a romantic evening.
Just as long as you return home before morning when you can sleep off the cold.
